docs.snippet: The Washington Navy Yard, where 13 people were killed in a shooting rampage on Monday, is a sprawling walled complex that covers about 16 city blocks in the rapidly developing southeast corner of the U.S. capital, not far from its new baseball sta...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Washington Navy Yard, where 13 people were killed in a shooting rampage on Monday, is a sprawling walled complex that covers about 16 city blocks in the rapidly developing southeast corner of the U.S. capital, not far from its new baseball stadium.

headline.main: Oldest Navy Facility Is Site of U.S. Shooting, Despite Security Checks
headline.print_headline: Oldest Navy Facility Is Site of U.S. Shooting, Despite Security Checks

docs.snippet: A man opened fire at the Naval Sea Systems Command building in the Washington Navy Yard on Monday in a shooting that left 13 people dead, including the gunman, not far from the U.S. Capitol and White House, officials said....
docs.lead_paragraph: A man opened fire at the Naval Sea Systems Command building in the Washington Navy Yard on Monday in a shooting that left 13 people dead, including the gunman, not far from the U.S. Capitol and White House, officials said.
